sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Logo from '../assets/argentBankLogo.png' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getAuthConnected, logout } from '../features/Auth/SliceAuth' import { emptyUserData, getUserData } from '../features/User/Slice' function Header() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const firstName = useSelector(getUserData).firstName const connected = useSelector(getAuthConnected) const handleLogOut = () => { dispatch(logout()) dispatch(emptyUserData()) } return (

Argent Bank

{!connected && ( Sign In )} {connected && ( <> {firstName} Sign out )}
) } export default Header
